::Scrap/Flare/Vycir/Supernova/Slasys::

Scrap shrugs. "Hey, your guess is as good as mine. Don't worry, 
though, we'll get you back to the Iron Fist."

Behind him, Supernova turns around and issues an order. All the 
Galactors but Scrap jump into the air, transforming into pieces of a 
jet. In a few seconds, a large jet comprised of Supernova, 
Flare ,Vycir, and Slasys lands near Scrap.

"Here," Scrap says after standing up and putting away his repair 
equipment, reaching his arm down to help Bonzai-Tron up. "Lets get in 
our ride."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Banzai-Tron:::
> 
> ::he is partially repaired by Scrap and starts to come to::
> Banzai-Tron: Uhhhh, what happened?
> ::He is awake, but he still needs a CR chamber bad::
